# Grind Cache

Grind Cache is a thin wrapper around [node-cache-manager](https://github.com/BryanDonovan/node-cache-manager/) for simple integration with [Grind](https://github.com/grindjs/framework). Once setup, youâ€™ll have a quick and easy to use key-value store in Grind that you can access via `app.cache`.

## Documentation

Full documentation for Grind Cache is available on the [Grind website](https://grind.rocks/docs/guides/cache).
